channel.title: Linkspam on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Linkspam on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: No Thanks, Spammers
item.description: Tedium has a decent number of readers, but when it comes down to it, it’s a small blip on the larger internet—a small professional publisher at a time when so many of our publishers are large and centralized. As a result of this relatively unique status, I get a lot of messages on a fairly regular basis asking me to do one of a few things: Update a link on a story I’ve already written to get in a business I didn’t previously mention.
